title: Sona Dj Crash
body:
In the last 3 games every time i play with and only with Dj Sona my game crashes i've tried with other chapmions and nothing happend when i play with Dj Sona my game get's to the loading screen then crashes and the Client starts to repair itself and this keeps going until the game ends  , i have  2.5 usable ram windows 10
this r3dlog for the game:

replies.body:
Hey captian ivy! 

Thanks for grabbing me your r3d logs! I'm going to poke into this today, but in the meantime, could you do me a favor and update your drivers and hop into a bot game and lemme know if you're still experiencing the issue?
